content.body: it would be really nice if we could get transcriptionists to stop double spacing after periods
Shouldn't be too hard to add that to our note fix up scripts?
content.formatted_body: Shouldn't be too hard to add that to our note fix up scripts?

content.body: for some cases yes, but it's still better if the source material needs less fixing. same thing with all the newlines hard-wrapping sentences from the same speaker
* for some cases yes, but it's still better if the source material needs less fixing. same thing with all the newlines hard-wrapping within sentences from the same speaker

m.new_content.body: for some cases yes, but it's still better if the source material needs less fixing. same thing with all the newlines hard-wrapping within sentences from the same speaker

content.body: both of those issues are already automatically fixed by the fix script
